name: hull-client
description: A barebones Node.js API client for hull.io
author: Romain Dardour <romain@hull.io>

scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:flow && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src -d lib && npm run documentation
scripts.documentation: documentation build src -f md -o API.md --access public --markdownToc=false --config documentation.yml
scripts.precommit: npm run documentation && git add API.md
